content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By checking 'I confirm' in the checkbox below:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I confirm that I have carefully reviewed and completed Walgreens 60-minute Corporate Integrity Agreement Training.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I agree to abide by the principles and requirements outlined in this training.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If I have questions relating to the content of this training or Walgreens policies and procedures, I will contact my manager or the Compliance and Ethics Office for further clarification.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I understand that we have incorporated compliance language into Walgreens Purpose Driven Leadership Behaviors given the importance of complying with laws and company policies and that I will be assessed on the behaviors that pertain to my role as part of the Annual Performance Review Process. (For WBA team members, you will be assessed on WBA Core Values. For Leadership Forum team members, you will be assessed on the Leadership Forum Framework).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I understand that failure to comply with Walgreens policies, procedures, and/or the legal requirements governing my work may result in disciplinary action up to and including termination.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
